blogPost.excerpt: Clubhouse is awesome for "I'm here, who can I listen to?", but not yet so awesome for scheduling future events and ensuring you don't miss your favorite mod. ====== YoYo helps moderators take their audience from 1 room to the next!
blogPost.body: Clubhouse is awesome for "I'm here, who can I listen to?", but not yet so awesome for scheduling future events and ensuring you don't miss your favorite mod. ====== YoYo helps moderators take their audience from 1 room to the next!
blogPost.title: YoYo - Accelerate and own your Clubhouse audience
blogPost.author: Peter Swain

localize.description: Clubhouse对于 "我在这里，我可以听谁说话？"来说是很棒的，但对于安排未来的活动和确保你不会错过你最喜欢的版主来说，还不是那么棒。====== YoYo帮助版主将他们的听众从1个房间带到下一个房间。
localize.tagline: 加速发展并拥有您的会所观众

localize.description: Clubhouse對於 "我在這裏，我可以聽誰說話？"來說是很棒的，但對於安排未來的活動和確保你不會錯過你最喜歡的版主來說，還不是那麼棒。====== YoYo幫助版主將他們的聽衆從1個房間帶到下一個房間。
localize.tagline: 加速發展並擁有您的會所觀衆

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 33 days in a row, down 65k from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/RkGhXs4FHJ

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院人数已经连续33天下降，比1月6日的高峰期下降了6.5万人次。🙏https://t.co/RkGhXs4FHJ。
科維德-19在美國的住院人數已經連續33天下降，比1月6日的高峯期下降了6.5萬人次。🙏https://t.co/RkGhXs4FHJ。

next.excerpt: Meet Maya your virtual assistant for entrepreneurs. Maya will be running tasks, listening, and communicating on what you need to grow your idea. She will keep you up to date on your current progress and provide the next step you need to take.
next.title: Maya Ai - The virtual assistant for entrepreneurs and startups

localize.description: 认识一下您的创业者虚拟助理Maya。玛雅将负责执行任务，倾听并沟通您发展想法所需的内容。她会让您了解您当前的进展，并提供您需要采取的下一步措施。
localize.tagline: 创业者和初创企业的虚拟助理。

localize.description: 認識一下您的創業者虛擬助理Maya。瑪雅將負責執行任務，傾聽並溝通您發展想法所需的內容。她會讓您瞭解您當前的進展，並提供您需要採取的下一步措施。
localize.tagline: 創業者和初創企業的虛擬助理。
